snippet: House Republicans talk about a White House connection, despite evidence to the contrary. It’s time they released the transcripts from their investigation.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Rep Darrell Issa for refusing to make public the full text from interviews conducted with Internal Revenue Service officials regarding inappropriate targeting of conservative groups.
lead_paragraph: House Republicans talk about a White House connection, despite evidence to the contrary. It’s time they released the transcripts from their investigation.

headline.main: Release the Facts About the I.R.S. Scandal
headline.print_headline: Release the Facts About the I.R.S. Scandal

keywords.value: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
keywords.name: organizations
